thread.title: Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday
thread.title_full: Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday

title: Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday
text:
Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday Share 
Girls Aloud stars Cheryl Fernandez-Versini and Kimberley Walsh joined forces to celebrate Nicola Roberts’ 30th birthday. 
The trio, minus former bandmates Sarah Harding and Nadine Coyle, went for the monochrome look as they marked Nicola’s milestone at Hotel Chantelle in London. 
Cheryl, who wore a Balmain striped dress with Giuseppe Zanotti metallic heels and a YSL handbag, posted afterwards: “@lilcola looking BREATHTAKING for her 30th!!!! Aaaarrgg when did that happen? She was just 17 a minute ago. 
“Not a better feeling in the world than dancing until it hurts with these two beauties. Happy birthday Ginge. I love you more than words.” 
She also added: “My baby girls all grown up but in the most beautiful way possible.” 
The birthday girl, who turns 30 today (October 5), ensured the spotlight remained on her as she chose a dress with a plunging neckline and thigh-high slit. 
Kimberley, who opted for a black-and-white cropped top and skirt, also shared photos of the night, including a shot of Nicola’s mermaid cake. Amazing 30th birthday party for the one and only Miss @NicolaRoberts thanks to @LoveEnt you're the best! #party #big30 #Nicola 's30th 🎈🎈🎈 
— Kimberley Walsh (@KimberleyJWalsh) October 5, 2015 Share article 
The trio, who had enjoyed a girls’ night out at the Pride Of Britain Awards a few days earlier, munched on burgers. Promoted Stories
